summary.paragraph: Welcome, my name is Renay Brown, and I am a problem solver experienced with CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and Kubernetes deployments. I specialize in automating deployments, optimizing cloud resources, and ensuring high availability for scalable applications. With a passion for innovation, I continuously seek out new technologies and industry best practices .

My goal in developing this site was to share my accomplishments and side projects I have been working on. I also hope to connect with like-minded professionals and showcase my expertise in cloud engineering and automation.

work.name: Booz Allen
work.summary: At Booz Allen, I served as an engineer for multiple cybersecurity and compliance management 3-tier web applications. One application I managed ran on a Kubernetes cluster (RKE2 and Azure Kubernetes Service), while the other operated on  Windows Server hosted on AWS infrastructure. My responsibilities included modifying and debugging Kubernetes clusters, updating and troubleshooting C# and JavaScript application pipelines, and automating tasks using Bash, PowerShell, Python, and Ansible.

work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: At Lockheed Martin, I played a key role in migrating avionic applications running on Hyper-V and windows servers to the cloud. My major contributions included containerizing applications, automating cloud infrastructure deployment using Terraform, and modifying CI/CD pipelines to support deployments to both cloud environments and on-site servers. Additionally, I served as a Linux administrator, managing database server configurations, ensuring security and compliance requirements were met, and automating patches usinng Ansible. I also served as a cloud administrator by setting up monitoring tools to optimize resource costs and ensuring that developers' virtual desktop images  were available and equipped with the necessary libraries and tools for development.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: A website I created to host my work experience , projects , and skills. The primary goal in this mini project was to expand my knowledege in AWS and automattion by kicking off this deployment using Terraform.
